ARABIC: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then I addressed them publicly and addressed them privately.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And declared to them in public and in private,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and preached to them in public, and also addressed them in secret.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then I conveyed the message to them, again, both in public and in private,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Then I also told them publicly and also spoke to them softly in private.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then verily, I proclaimed to them in public, and I have appealed to them in private.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then surely I spoke to them in public and I spoke to them in secret:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then indeed I spoke publicly unto them, and I spoke unto them secretly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! I have made public proclamation unto them, and I have appealed to them in private.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and spoke to them in public and in private."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then verily spake Unto them openly, and secretly also I addressed them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and again appealed to them publicly and confided with them privately,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Further I have spoken to them in public and secretly in private,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then verily, I proclaimed to them in public, and I have appealed to them in private,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and indeed, I spoke to them both publicly and in secret:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then I appealed to them publicly, and I spoke to them privately.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:9] then assuredly I proclaimed to them, with my voice, and I confided, my words, to them secretly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! I have made public proclamation unto them) I called them openly to the message and explained to them, (and I have appealed to them in private) and I called them secretly to the message.
